ing: 2 cucumbers, sliced, or more to taste
4 peaches, halved and pitted, or more to taste
des: "I found out about this from a friend from the Humane Society where I volunteer, just had to share it! If you don't want to wait all night, try using a juicer."
ins: Combine cucumbers, peaches, mint, and salt in a pitcher; stir gently. Refrigerate for 8 hours to overnight.
